basic_information.committee_name: CLA - Mass Comm Dan Smith Photography

description: This scholarship was established by former faculty member Karen McGrath, honoring UCO's Director of Photographic Services, Dan Smith, for his contributions to the campus. It provides a scholarship to a Photographic Arts major. Eligibility Requirements Photography major Junior or Senior status in the fall that the scholarship is disbursed Minimum 3.0 GPA Enrolled full-time

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
